## Summary
What incident or engine component does this change affect?

## Type
- [ ] Incident docs (timeline/findings)
- [ ] Evidence index / manifest
- [ ] Escalation packet (letter + README)
- [ ] HEE templates
- [ ] Repo structure / hygiene

## Incident Integrity Checks
- [ ] One incident per folder
- [ ] Claims are traceable to evidence
- [ ] No protocol duplication (protocols belong in StegDB)
- [ ] No secrets or sensitive identifiers

## Escalation Readiness (if applicable)
- [ ] `letter.md` is send-ready
- [ ] `README.md` links to required supporting docs
- [ ] `attachments.md` is complete
